data.title: Andy Roberts - Baseball 2014
data.meta_description: Baseball 2014 - Andy Roberts: The Official Athletics Website for the Old Dominion Monarchs.
data.text:
2014: Pitched a complete game vs. UAB...fanned 5 vs. St. Joseph's and UTSA...

2013: Team best ERA at 2.92 which ranked seventh best in CAA....Led team with five wins...3-2 in CAA games...Fanned six in six innings at Georgia State...Pitched a combined shutout against Temple.

CAREER: Attended Iowa Western CC in Council Bluffs, Iowa...The 2009 Pitcher of the Year in his junior year at Prescott High School in Arizona... He compiled a 20-2 record with a 2.00 ERA for 2012 Junior College National Champion Iowa Western...ICCAC All-region and All-District selection...He compiled a 1.45 ERA at Iowa Western CC in spring 2011 He had the most appearances (18) on his team in spring 2011 Made two appearances at the 2011 JUCO World Series He went 6-0 in the Arizona Collegiate Wood bat League in the summer of 2011 Compiled the lowest ERA in the league at 2.53 and was the starting pitcher for the All-Star game.

PERSONAL: Andy Roberts is the son of Bill and Ann Roberts...Has one sister, Audrey (19)...Plans to major in criminal justice...Favorite Sports Personality: David Price...Favorite Foods:Burrito.
